decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority (before the building is used).

Condition : 2 - The permission hereby granted shall be for a limited period expiring on 22nd April 2005 when the use shall cease, and all equipment associated with the use shall be removed from the site, and the site returned to its former condition as a yard.

Condition : 3 - The premises shall be used for car wash/valeting service. and for no other purpose (including any other purpose in Class sui generis  of the Schedule to the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987, or in any provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification).
Condition : 4 - The use hereby permitted for car wash/valeting service  purposes shall not be carried on outside the following times 10am-6pm Monday -Sunday.
description: Continued use of premises as car wash/valeting service for temporary period of 3 years.
